snippet: The N.H.L. and players’ association were back at the bargaining table Tuesday, a constructive turn in the seven-week lockout.
abstract: NHL and players' union resume negotiations, but major disagreements remain.
lead_paragraph: The N.H.L. and players’ association were back at the bargaining table Tuesday, a constructive turn in the seven-week lockout.

headline.seo: N.H.L. and Players Union Resuming Negotiations
headline.main: League and Players Union Resume Bargaining, but Progress Isn’t Guaranteed
headline.print_headline: League and Players Union Resume Bargaining, but Progress Isn’t Guaranteed
